effect.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon and switch it with his or her Active Pokémon.

requirements.description: Opponent must have at least one benched Pokemon

tips: Always run 3-4 copies in competitive decks - this card is essential
Target benched Pokemon with low HP for easy prize knockouts
Gust up unevolved Basics to deny opponent's evolution strategy
Calculate damage to ensure you can KO the Pokemon you Gust up
Combine with Energy Removal to trap expensive-retreat Pokemon active
Save Gust for crucial turns rather than using it casually
Excellent for taking multiple prizes in one turn by chaining Gusts
Can force up Pokemon with high retreat costs to put opponent in difficult positions

rulings.ruling: You choose 1 Pokemon from your opponent's bench
That Pokemon switches places with your opponent's Active Pokemon
The previously Active Pokemon goes to the bench
You cannot play Gust of Wind if your opponent has no benched Pokemon
You choose which benched Pokemon to switch - not your opponent
This does not count as retreating (no retreat cost is paid)
Any effects on the Active Pokemon that reference it as 'Active Pokemon' end when it moves to bench
This can force up Pokemon that have high retreat costs or are unable to retreat
